TopicTitle: Request for a Stock Dragon Rider/Red Dragon craft.

Articles.Content:
I'm making a Constellation mission. The newer one.

I have the habitat and the Dragon V2, but I don't have a good Dragon Rider/Red Dragon.

It needs 4 Kerbal seats and the ability to EVA.

It also needs to be lower in part count and look good.

Thanks in advance!

DMSP

> 
> [https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/a/aa/Dragon_landing_on_Mars.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/a/aa/Dragon_landing_on_Mars.jpg)
> Exactly this one ?

Yep!

This would rock if you could make it.

- - - Updated - - -

A simulation of the updated mission.

![DragonMars.jpg](http://digitalvideo.8m.net/SpaceX/DragonMars.jpg)

Pretty cool

I'm trying right now, but it's hard

What is the bottom diameter, 2.5m or 3.75m ?

What is the upper docking port size ?

![tSRnJzR.png](http://i.imgur.com/tSRnJzR.png)Hope you'll like it !
